about_the_game:
Find Your Way Through a Flooded World!


Trapped in a sinister and silent ruin, face the dangers all around and try to drain the water submerging an ancient island haunted by a strange force. Unlock new paths to explore the depths and find the secrets about mysterious people living underground and about most importantly about yourself.

Make good use of your magical shoes to brave the highest jumps, the deepest drops, and the most heart-pounding escapes. Connect with the force of the island to make true a foretold but forgotten fate.







Game Features


  • Platform around a vast world to explore, with atmospheric and surprising environments, loose your way in the interconnected paths and find yourself again in an unexpected and rewarding manner.
  • Experience the classical 2D side-scrolling action, refined to modern standards.
  • State of the art controls to allow precise platforming and satisfying movability.
  • Play with a well-rounded character with realistic and believable animations and lots of detailed interaction with the world.
  • Unlock new abilities and use the power of your magical shoes to expand the moveset of your character: jump higher and higher, propel yourself using walls, slide, bounce… and walk on hanging ropes!
  • Don’t be afraid of losing progress: with a friendly and accessible system of checkpoints, all players can face even the most difficult challenges light-heartedly!
  • Move through amazing 2D pixel art with lots of unique hand-crafted regions to discover.
  • Reach the most unthinkable places of the island, try to break the boundaries of the world and to find new breaches to explore the most secret rooms.
  • Talk with survivors and other NPCs to learn about your role and what’s around you. Discover the history of the island and its inhabitants by finding lost clues, notes, and other hints.
  • Immerse yourself in the adventure thanks to a minimalistic soundtrack composed of realistic environmental sounds.
  • Experience two different endings depending on what you find during the game!







A Hand-Crafted World Made for the Most Immersive Experience


The world of Drowned has been designed with the intent of engaging the player in exploring its nooks and crannies. The different environments and atmospheres make up for a various emotional experience.

The minimalistic and detailed-oriented philosophy behind the game idea and design allows the players to fully immerse themselves in the world of Drowned. If you want to feel it in your skin, what are you waiting for? Get in for an adventure!
